sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense/> <description>This cybernetic arm does far more than simply replace a limb; it also includes a basic scanner for medium range detection. The CyberScanner displays data on a holo-projector that appears above the user's open palm and can show nearby motion, life-forms, energy signatures, and other common targets as desired. The Mod IV Scanner Limb incorporates a portable scanner, and unlike most cybernetics, is concealed by a synthflesh covering to disguise the fact that there is anything out of the ordinary about the limb.   Models Include: Neuro-Saav Technologies CyberScanner Limb, NeuroFabritech ScanMaster Arm.</description> <encumbrance>0</encumbrance> <hard_points/> <hp_required/> <name>Cyberscanner Limb</name> <number>GEAR0001069</number> <price>4000</price> <range/> <rarity>7</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 19:28:55</sys_created_on> <sys_id>95b3a3282f14a450e0f497eef699b6af</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 19:28:55</sys_updated_on> <type>gear</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
